created_at.description: The timestamp when the ticket skip entry was created

id.description: Unique identifier for the ticket skip entry

reason.description: The reason for skipping the ticket

ticket_id.description: The unique identifier of the skipped ticket

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the ticket skip entry was last updated

user_id.description: The unique identifier of the user who skipped the ticket

ticket.description: Information related to the skipped ticket
